ReferenceBlocks.text: LUKE

block.text: LUKAS

ReferenceBlocks.text: LUKE CHP 1
Many have undertaken to set in order a narrative concerning those matters which have been fulfilled among us,
just as they were handed down to us by those who were eyewitnesses and servants of the word from the beginning.

block.text: Teofilus yang mulia, Banyak orang telah berusaha menyusun suatu berita tentang peristiwa-peristiwa yang telah terjadi di antara kita,
seperti yang disampaikan kepada kita oleh mereka, yang dari semula adalah saksi mata dan pelayan Firman.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore, it seemed good to me also, having carefully investigated from the beginning, to write for you an orderly account, most excellent Theophilus.

block.text: Karena itu, setelah aku menyelidiki segala peristiwa itu dengan seksama dari asal mulanya, aku mengambil keputusan untuk membukukannya dengan teratur bagimu,

ReferenceBlocks.text: This way, you can be sure you know the truth about the things you have been taught.

block.text: supaya engkau dapat mengetahui, bahwa segala sesuatu yang diajarkan kepadamu sungguh benar.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There was in the days of Herod, the king of Judea, a certain priest named Zechariah, of the priestly division of Abijah. He had a wife of the daughters of Aaron, and her name was Elizabeth.

block.text: Pada zaman Herodes, raja Yudea, adalah seorang imam yang bernama Zakharia dari rombongan Abia. Isterinya juga berasal dari keturunan Harun, namanya Elisabet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were both righteous before God, walking blamelessly in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord.

block.text: Keduanya adalah benar di hadapan Allah dan hidup menurut segala perintah dan ketetapan Tuhan dengan tidak bercacat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But they had no child, because Elizabeth was barren, and they both were well advanced in years.

block.text: Tetapi mereka tidak mempunyai anak, sebab Elisabet mandul dan keduanya telah lanjut umurnya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: One day Zechariah's division was on duty and he was serving as priest before God.

block.text: Pada suatu kali, waktu tiba giliran rombongannya, Zakharia melakukan tugas keimaman di hadapan Tuhan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: According to the custom of the priests, he was chosen by lot to go into the temple of the Lord and burn incense.

block.text: Sebab ketika diundi, sebagaimana lazimnya, untuk menentukan imam yang bertugas, dialah yang ditunjuk untuk masuk ke dalam Bait Suci dan membakar ukupan di situ.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The whole multitude of the people was praying outside at the hour of incense.

block.text: Sementara itu seluruh umat berkumpul di luar dan sembahyang. Waktu itu adalah waktu pembakaran ukupan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: An angel of the Lord appeared to him, standing on the right side of the altar of incense.

block.text: Maka tampaklah kepada Zakharia seorang malaikat Tuhan berdiri di sebelah kanan mezbah pembakaran ukupan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Zechariah was troubled when he saw him, and fear fell upon him.
But the angel said to him,

block.text: Melihat hal itu ia terkejut dan menjadi takut.
Tetapi malaikat itu berkata kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don't be afraid, Zechariah, because your request has been heard, and your wife, Elizabeth, will bear you a son, and you shall call his name John.

block.text: <<Jangan takut, hai Zakharia, sebab doamu telah dikabulkan dan Elisabet, isterimu, akan melahirkan seorang anak laki-laki bagimu dan haruslah engkau menamai dia Yohanes.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You will have joy and gladness; and many will rejoice at his birth.

block.text: Engkau akan bersukacita dan bergembira, bahkan banyak orang akan bersukacita atas kelahirannya itu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he will be great in the sight of the Lord, and he will drink no wine nor strong drink. He will be filled with the Holy Spirit, even from his mother's womb.

block.text: Sebab ia akan besar di hadapan Tuhan dan ia tidak akan minum anggur atau minuman keras dan ia akan penuh dengan Roh Kudus mulai dari rahim ibunya;

ReferenceBlocks.text: He will turn many of the children of Israel to the Lord, their God.

block.text: ia akan membuat banyak orang Israel berbalik kepada Tuhan, Allah mereka,

ReferenceBlocks.text: He will go before him in the spirit and power of Elijah, ‘to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children,’ and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just; to prepare a people prepared for the Lord.”

block.text: dan ia akan berjalan mendahului Tuhan dalam roh dan kuasa Elia untuk membuat hati bapa-bapa berbalik kepada anak-anaknya dan hati orang-orang durhaka kepada pikiran orang-orang benar dan dengan demikian menyiapkan bagi Tuhan suatu umat yang layak bagi-Nya.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Zechariah said to the angel,

block.text: Lalu kata Zakharia kepada malaikat itu:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “How can I be sure of this? For I am an old man, and my wife is well advanced in years.”

block.text: <<Bagaimanakah aku tahu, bahwa hal ini akan terjadi? Sebab aku sudah tua dan isteriku sudah lanjut umurnya.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: The angel answered him,

block.text: Jawab malaikat itu kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I am Gabriel, who stands in the presence of God. I was sent to speak to you, and to bring you this good news.

block.text: <<Akulah Gabriel yang melayani Allah dan aku telah diutus untuk berbicara dengan engkau dan untuk menyampaikan kabar baik ini kepadamu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, you will be silent and not able to speak, until the day that these things will happen, because you didn't believe my words, which will be fulfilled in their proper time.”

block.text: Sesungguhnya engkau akan menjadi bisu dan tidak dapat berkata-kata sampai kepada hari, di mana semuanya ini terjadi, karena engkau tidak percaya akan perkataanku yang akan nyata kebenarannya pada waktunya.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: The people were waiting for Zechariah, and they marveled that he delayed in the temple.

block.text: Sementara itu orang banyak menanti-nantikan Zakharia. Mereka menjadi heran, bahwa ia begitu lama berada dalam Bait Suci.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he came out, he could not speak to them, and they said:

block.text: Ketika ia keluar, ia tidak dapat berkata-kata kepada mereka dan mengertilah mereka,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He has seen a vision in the temple!”

block.text: bahwa ia telah melihat suatu penglihatan di dalam Bait Suci.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He continued making hand signs to them, and remained mute.

block.text: Lalu ia memberi isyarat kepada mereka, sebab ia tetap bisu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened, when the days of his service were fulfilled, he departed to his house.

block.text: Ketika selesai jangka waktu tugas jabatannya, ia pulang ke rumah.

ReferenceBlocks.text: After these days Elizabeth, his wife, conceived, and she hid herself five months, saying,

block.text: Beberapa lama kemudian Elisabet, isterinya, mengandung dan selama lima bulan ia tidak menampakkan diri, katanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Thus has the Lord done to me in the days in which he looked at me, to take away my reproach among men.”

block.text: <<Inilah suatu perbuatan Tuhan bagiku, dan sekarang Ia berkenan menghapuskan aibku di depan orang.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now in the sixth month, the angel Gabriel was sent from God to a city of Galilee, called Nazareth.

block.text: Dalam bulan yang keenam Allah menyuruh malaikat Gabriel pergi ke sebuah kota di Galilea bernama Nazaret,

ReferenceBlocks.text: He went to a virgin who was pledged to be married to a man named Joseph, of the house of David. The virgin's name was Mary.

block.text: kepada seorang perawan yang bertunangan dengan seorang bernama Yusuf dari keluarga Daud; nama perawan itu Maria.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Having come in, the angel said to her,

block.text: Ketika malaikat itu masuk ke rumah Maria, ia berkata:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Rejoice, you highly favored one! The Lord is with you. Blessed are you among women!”

block.text: <<Salam, hai engkau yang dikaruniai, Tuhan menyertai engkau.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when she saw him, she was greatly troubled at the saying, and considered what kind of salutation this might be.
The angel said to her,

block.text: Maria terkejut mendengar perkataan itu, lalu bertanya di dalam hatinya, apakah arti salam itu.
Kata malaikat itu kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don't be afraid, Mary, for you have found favor with God.

block.text: <<Jangan takut, hai Maria, sebab engkau beroleh kasih karunia di hadapan Allah.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, you will conceive in your womb, and bring forth a son, and will call his name ‘Jesus.’

block.text: Sesungguhnya engkau akan mengandung dan akan melahirkan seorang anak laki-laki dan hendaklah engkau menamai Dia Yesus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He will be great, and will be called the Son of the Most High. The Lord God will give him the throne of his father, David.

block.text: Ia akan menjadi besar dan akan disebut Anak Allah Yang Mahatinggi. Dan Tuhan Allah akan mengaruniakan kepada-Nya takhta Daud, bapa leluhur-Nya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He will reign over the house of Jacob forever. There will be no end to his Kingdom.”

block.text: La akan menjadi raja atas kaum keturunan Yakub sampai selama-lamanya dan Kerajaan-Nya tidak akan berkesudahan.>>
<<Bagaimana hal itu mungkin terjadi, >>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Mary said to the angel,

block.text: Kata Maria kepada malaikat itu:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “How can this be, since I am a virgin?”

block.text: <<karena aku belum bersuami?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: The angel answered her,

block.text: Jawab malaikat itu kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The Holy Spirit will come on you, and the power of the Most High will overshadow you. Therefore also the holy one who is born from you will be called the Son of God.

block.text: <<Roh Kudus akan turun atasmu dan kuasa Allah Yang Mahatinggi akan menaungi engkau; sebab itu anak yang akan kaulahirkan itu akan disebut kudus, Anak Allah.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, Elizabeth, your relative, also has conceived a son in her old age; and this is the sixth month with her who was called barren.

block.text: Dan sesungguhnya, Elisabet, sanakmu itu, iapun sedang mengandung seorang anak laki-laki pada hari tuanya dan inilah bulan yang keenam bagi dia, yang disebut mandul itu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For everything spoken by God is possible.”

block.text: Sebab bagi Allah tidak ada yang mustahil.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Mary said,

block.text: Kata Maria:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, I am the handmaid of the Lord; be it done to me according to your word.”

block.text: <<Sesungguhnya aku ini adalah hamba Tuhan; jadilah padaku menurut perkataanmu itu.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: The angel departed from her.

block.text: Lalu malaikat itu meninggalkan dia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Mary arose in those days and went into the hill country with haste, into a city of Judah.

block.text: Beberapa waktu kemudian berangkatlah Maria dan langsung berjalan ke pegunungan menuju sebuah kota di Yehuda.

ReferenceBlocks.text: She entered into the house of Zechariah and greeted Elizabeth.

block.text: Di situ ia masuk ke rumah Zakharia dan memberi salam kepada Elisabet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened, when Elizabeth heard Mary's greeting, that the baby leaped in her womb, and Elizabeth was filled with the Holy Spirit.

block.text: Dan ketika Elisabet mendengar salam Maria, melonjaklah anak yang di dalam rahimnya dan Elisabetpun penuh dengan Roh Kudus,

ReferenceBlocks.text: She called out with a loud voice, and said,

block.text: lalu berseru dengan suara nyaring:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Blessed are you among women, and blessed is the fruit of your womb!

block.text: <<Diberkatilah engkau di antara semua perempuan dan diberkatilah buah rahimmu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Why am I so favored, that the mother of my Lord should come to me?

block.text: Siapakah aku ini sampai ibu Tuhanku datang mengunjungi aku?

ReferenceBlocks.text: For behold, when the voice of your greeting came into my ears, the baby in my womb leaped for joy!

block.text: Sebab sesungguhnya, ketika salammu sampai kepada telingaku, anak yang di dalam rahimku melonjak kegirangan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Blessed is she who believed, for there will be a fulfillment of the things which have been spoken to her from the Lord!”

block.text: Dan berbahagialah ia, yang telah percaya, sebab apa yang dikatakan kepadanya dari Tuhan, akan terlaksana.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Mary said,

block.text: Lalu kata Maria:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “My soul magnifies the Lord.
My spirit has rejoiced in God my Savior.

block.text: <<Jiwaku memuliakan Tuhan,
dan hatiku bergembira karena Allah, Juruselamatku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He has looked at the humble state of his handmaid. For behold, from now on, all generations will call me blessed.

block.text: Ia telah memperhatikan kerendahan hamba-Nya. Sesungguhnya, mulai dari sekarang segala keturunan akan menyebut aku berbahagia,

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he who is mighty has done great things for me. Holy is his name.

block.text: karena Yang Mahakuasa telah melakukan perbuatan-perbuatan besar kepadaku dan nama-Nya adalah kudus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: His mercy is for generations of generations on those who fear him.

block.text: Dan rahmat-Nya turun-temurun atas orang yang takut akan Dia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He has shown strength with his arm. He has scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts.

block.text: Ia memperlihatkan kuasa-Nya dengan perbuatan tangan-Nya dan mencerai-beraikan orang-orang yang congkak hatinya;>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He has put down princes from their thrones. And has exalted the lowly.

block.text: <<Ia menurunkan orang-orang yang berkuasa dari takhtanya dan meninggikan orang-orang yang rendah;

ReferenceBlocks.text: He has filled the hungry with good things. He has sent the rich away empty.

block.text: Ia melimpahkan segala yang baik kepada orang yang lapar, dan menyuruh orang yang kaya pergi dengan tangan hampa;

ReferenceBlocks.text: He has given help to Israel, his servant, in remembrance of his mercy,
as he spoke to our fathers, to Abraham and to his offspring forever.”

block.text: Ia menolong Israel, hamba-Nya, karena Ia mengingat rahmat-Nya,
seperti yang dijanjikan-Nya kepada nenek moyang kita, kepada Abraham dan keturunannya untuk selama-lamanya.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Mary stayed with her about three months, and then returned to her house.

block.text: Dan Maria tinggal kira-kira tiga bulan lamanya bersama dengan Elisabet, lalu pulang kembali ke rumahnya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now the time that Elizabeth should give birth was fulfilled, and she brought forth a son.

block.text: Kemudian genaplah bulannya bagi Elisabet untuk bersalin dan iapun melahirkan seorang anak laki-laki.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Her neighbors and her relatives heard that the Lord had magnified his mercy towards her, and they rejoiced with her.

block.text: Ketika tetangga-tetangganya serta sanak saudaranya mendengar, bahwa Tuhan telah menunjukkan rahmat-Nya yang begitu besar kepadanya, bersukacitalah mereka bersama-sama dengan dia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened on the eighth day, that they came to circumcise the child; and they would have called him Zechariah, after the name of the father.
His mother answered,

block.text: Maka datanglah mereka pada hari yang kedelapan untuk menyunatkan anak itu dan mereka hendak menamai dia Zakharia menurut nama bapanya,
tetapi ibunya berkata:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Not so; but he will be called John.”

block.text: <<Jangan, ia harus dinamai Yohanes.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said to her,

block.text: Kata mereka kepadanya:

block.characterId: neighbors and relatives of Elizabeth and Zacharias (Zechariah)

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: neighbors and relatives of Elizabeth and Zacharias (Zechariah)
ReferenceBlocks.text: “There is no one among your relatives who is called by this name.”

block.text: <<Tidak ada di antara sanak saudaramu yang bernama demikian.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: They made signs to his father, asking:

block.text: Lalu mereka memberi isyarat kepada bapanya untuk bertanya nama apa yang hendak diberikannya kepada

block.characterId: neighbors and relatives of Elizabeth and Zacharias (Zechariah)

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: neighbors and relatives of Elizabeth and Zacharias (Zechariah)
ReferenceBlocks.text: “What is his name?”

block.text: anaknya itu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He asked for a writing tablet, and wrote, “His name is John.” They all marveled.

block.text: Ia meminta batu tulis, lalu menuliskan kata-kata ini: <<Namanya adalah Yohanes.>> Dan merekapun heran semuanya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: His mouth was opened immediately, and his tongue freed, and he spoke, saying:

block.text: Dan seketika itu juga terbukalah mulutnya dan terlepaslah lidahnya, lalu ia

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Praise God!”

block.text: berkata-kata dan memuji Allah.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Fear came on all who lived around them, and all these sayings were talked about throughout all the hill country of Judea.

block.text: Maka ketakutanlah semua orang yang tinggal di sekitarnya, dan segala peristiwa itu menjadi buah tutur di seluruh pegunungan Yudea.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All who heard them laid them up in their heart, saying,

block.text: Dan semua orang, yang mendengarnya, merenungkannya dan berkata:

block.characterId: everyone in Judean hills who heard

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: everyone in Judean hills who heard
ReferenceBlocks.text: “What then will this child be?”

block.text: <<Menjadi apakah anak ini nanti?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: The hand of the Lord was with him.

block.text: Sebab tangan Tuhan menyertai dia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: His father, Zechariah, was filled with the Holy Spirit, and prophesied, saying,

block.text: Dan Zakharia, ayahnya, penuh dengan Roh Kudus, lalu bernubuat, katanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Blessed be the Lord, the God of Israel, for he has visited and worked redemption for his people;

block.text: <<Terpujilah Tuhan, Allah Israel, sebab Ia melawat umat-Nya dan membawa kelepasan baginya,

ReferenceBlocks.text: and has raised up a horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David.

block.text: Ia menumbuhkan sebuah tanduk keselamatan bagi kita di dalam keturunan Daud, hamba-Nya itu,

ReferenceBlocks.text: (He spoke this long ago by the mouth of his holy prophets):

block.text: —seperti yang telah difirmankan-Nya sejak purbakala oleh mulut nabi-nabi-Nya yang kudus—

ReferenceBlocks.text: That we should have salvation from our enemies, and from the hand of all who hate us;

block.text: untuk melepaskan kita dari musuh-musuh kita dan dari tangan semua orang yang membenci kita,

ReferenceBlocks.text: to show mercy towards our fathers, to remember his holy covenant;

block.text: untuk menunjukkan rahmat-Nya kepada nenek moyang kita dan mengingat akan perjanjian-Nya yang kudus,

ReferenceBlocks.text: the oath which he spoke to Abraham, our father,
to grant to us that we, being delivered out of the hand of our enemies, should serve him without fear,
In holiness and righteousness before him all the days of our life.

block.text: yaitu sumpah yang diucapkan-Nya kepada Abraham, bapa leluhur kita, bahwa Ia mengaruniai kita,
supaya kita, terlepas dari tangan musuh, dapat beribadah kepada-Nya tanpa takut,
dalam kekudusan dan kebenaran di hadapan-Nya seumur hidup kita.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: And you, child, will be called a prophet of the Most High, for you will go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways.

block.text: <<Dan engkau, hai anakku, akan disebut nabi Allah Yang Mahatinggi; karena engkau akan berjalan mendahului Tuhan untuk mempersiapkan jalan bagi-Nya,

ReferenceBlocks.text: You will give knowledge of salvation to his people by the remission of their sins.

block.text: untuk memberikan kepada umat-Nya pengertian akan keselamatan yang berdasarkan pengampunan dosa-dosa mereka,

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yes, our God is full of tenderness and kindness. He shines a light on us from above, like the rising sun.

block.text: oleh rahmat dan belas kasihan dari Allah kita, dengan mana Ia akan melawat kita, Surya pagi dari tempat yang tinggi,

ReferenceBlocks.text: It will enlighten those who live in the darkness and the shadow of death. It will guide our steps along the road of peace.”

block.text: untuk menyinari mereka yang diam dalam kegelapan dan dalam naungan maut untuk mengarahkan kaki kita kepada jalan damai sejahtera.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: The child was growing, and becoming strong in spirit, and was in the desert until the day of his public appearance to Israel.

block.text: Adapun anak itu bertambah besar dan makin kuat rohnya. Dan ia tinggal di padang gurun sampai kepada hari ia harus menampakkan diri kepada Israel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: LUKE CHP 2
Now it happened in those days, that a decree went out from Caesar Augustus that all the world should be enrolled.

block.text: Pada waktu itu Kaisar Agustus mengeluarkan suatu perintah, menyuruh mendaftarkan semua orang di seluruh dunia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This was the first enrollment made when Quirinius was governor of Syria.

block.text: Inilah pendaftaran yang pertama kali diadakan sewaktu Kirenius menjadi wali negeri di Siria.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All went to enroll themselves, everyone to his own city.

block.text: Maka pergilah semua orang mendaftarkan diri, masing-masing di kotanya sendiri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Joseph also went up from Galilee, out of the city of Nazareth, into Judea, to the city of David, which is called Bethlehem, because he was of the house and family of David.

block.text: Demikian juga Yusuf pergi dari kota Nazaret di Galilea ke Yudea, ke kota Daud yang bernama Betlehem, —karena ia berasal dari keluarga dan keturunan Daud—

ReferenceBlocks.text: He went to be registered with Mary, who was pledged to be married to him as wife, and was expecting a child.

block.text: supaya didaftarkan bersama-sama dengan Maria, tunangannya, yang sedang mengandung.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened, while they were there, that the day had come that she should give birth.

block.text: Ketika mereka di situ tibalah waktunya bagi Maria untuk bersalin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: She brought forth her firstborn son, and she wrapped him in bands of cloth, and laid him in a feeding trough, because there was no room for them in the inn.

block.text: Ia melahirkan seorang anak laki-laki, anaknya yang sulung, lalu dibungkusnya dengan lampin dan dibaringkannya di dalam palungan, karena tidak ada tempat bagi mereka di rumah penginapan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There were shepherds in the same country staying in the field, and keeping watch by night over their flock.

block.text: Di daerah itu ada gembala-gembala yang tinggal di padang menjaga kawanan ternak mereka pada waktu malam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, an angel of the Lord stood by them, and the glory of the Lord shone around them, and they were terrified.
The angel said to them,

block.text: Tiba-tiba berdirilah seorang malaikat Tuhan di dekat mereka dan kemuliaan Tuhan bersinar meliputi mereka dan mereka sangat ketakutan.
Lalu kata malaikat itu kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don't be afraid, for behold, I bring you good news of great joy which will be to all the people.

block.text: <<Jangan takut, sebab sesungguhnya aku memberitakan kepadamu kesukaan besar untuk seluruh bangsa:

ReferenceBlocks.text: For there is born to you, this day, in the city of David, a Savior, who is Christ the Lord.

block.text: Hari ini telah lahir bagimu Juruselamat, yaitu Kristus, Tuhan, di kota Daud.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This is the sign to you: you will find a baby wrapped in strips of cloth, lying in a feeding trough.”

block.text: Dan inilah tandanya bagimu: Kamu akan menjumpai seorang bayi dibungkus dengan lampin dan terbaring di dalam palungan.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Suddenly, there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly army praising God, and saying,

block.text: Dan tiba-tiba tampaklah bersama-sama dengan malaikat itu sejumlah besar bala tentara sorga yang memuji Allah, katanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Glory to God in the highest, on earth peace, good will toward men.”

block.text: <<Kemuliaan bagi Allah di tempat yang mahatinggi dan damai sejahtera di bumi di antara manusia yang berkenan kepada-Nya.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened, when the angels went away from them into the sky, that the shepherds said one to another,

block.text: Setelah malaikat-malaikat itu meninggalkan mereka dan kembali ke sorga, gembala-gembala itu berkata seorang kepada yang lain:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Let's go to Bethlehem, now, and see this thing that has happened, which the Lord has made known to us.”

block.text: <<Marilah kita pergi ke Betlehem untuk melihat apa yang terjadi di sana, seperti yang diberitahukan Tuhan kepada kita.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: They came with haste, and found both Mary and Joseph, and the baby was lying in the feeding trough.

block.text: Lalu mereka cepat-cepat berangkat dan menjumpai Maria dan Yusuf dan bayi itu, yang sedang berbaring di dalam palungan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they saw it, they publicized widely the saying which was spoken to them about this child.

block.text: Dan ketika mereka melihat-Nya, mereka memberitahukan apa yang telah dikatakan kepada mereka tentang Anak itu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All who heard it wondered at the things which were spoken to them by the shepherds.

block.text: Dan semua orang yang mendengarnya heran tentang apa yang dikatakan gembala-gembala itu kepada mereka.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Mary kept all these sayings, pondering them in her heart.

block.text: Tetapi Maria menyimpan segala perkara itu di dalam hatinya dan merenungkannya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The shepherds returned, glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen, just as it was told them.

block.text: Maka kembalilah gembala-gembala itu sambil memuji dan memuliakan Allah karena segala sesuatu yang mereka dengar dan mereka lihat, semuanya sesuai dengan apa yang telah dikatakan kepada mereka.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When eight days were fulfilled for the circumcision of the child, his name was called Jesus, which was given by the angel before he was conceived in the womb.

block.text: Dan ketika genap delapan hari dan Ia harus disunatkan, Ia diberi nama Yesus, yaitu nama yang disebut oleh malaikat sebelum Ia dikandung ibu-Nya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were fulfilled, they brought him up to Jerusalem, to present him to the Lord
(as it is written in the law of the Lord,

block.text: Dan ketika genap waktu pentahiran, menurut hukum Taurat Musa, mereka membawa Dia ke Yerusalem untuk menyerahkan-Nya kepada Tuhan,
seperti ada tertulis dalam hukum Tuhan:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Every male who opens the womb shall be called holy to the Lord”),

block.text: <<Semua anak laki-laki sulung harus dikuduskan bagi Allah>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: and to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord,

block.text: dan untuk mempersembahkan korban menurut apa yang difirmankan dalam hukum Tuhan,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “A pair of turtledoves, or two young pigeons.”

block.text: yaitu sepasang burung tekukur atau dua ekor anak burung merpati.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, there was a man in Jerusalem whose name was Simeon. This man was righteous and devout, looking for the consolation of Israel, and the Holy Spirit was on him.

block.text: Adalah di Yerusalem seorang bernama Simeon. Ia seorang yang benar dan saleh yang menantikan penghiburan bagi Israel. Roh Kudus ada di atasnya,

ReferenceBlocks.text: It had been revealed to him by the Holy Spirit that he should not see death before he had seen the Lord's Christ.

block.text: dan kepadanya telah dinyatakan oleh Roh Kudus, bahwa ia tidak akan mati sebelum ia melihat Mesias, yaitu Dia yang diurapi Tuhan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He came in the Spirit into the temple. When the parents brought in the child, Jesus, that they might do concerning him according to the custom of the law.

block.text: Ia datang ke Bait Allah oleh Roh Kudus. Ketika Yesus, Anak itu, dibawa masuk oleh orang tua-Nya untuk melakukan kepada-Nya apa yang ditentukan hukum Taurat,

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he received him into his arms, and blessed God, and said,

block.text: ia menyambut Anak itu dan menatang-Nya sambil memuji Allah, katanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Now you are releasing your servant, Master, according to your word, in peace.

block.text: <<Sekarang, Tuhan, biarkanlah hamba-Mu ini pergi dalam damai sejahtera, sesuai dengan firman-Mu,

ReferenceBlocks.text: For my eyes have seen your salvation,
which you have prepared before the face of all peoples;

block.text: sebab mataku telah melihat keselamatan yang dari pada-Mu,
yang telah Engkau sediakan di hadapan segala bangsa,

ReferenceBlocks.text: a light for revelation to the nations, and the glory of your people Israel.”

block.text: yaitu terang yang menjadi penyataan bagi bangsa-bangsa lain dan menjadi kemuliaan bagi umat-Mu, Israel.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Joseph and his mother were marveling at the things which were spoken concerning him.

block.text: Dan bapa serta ibu-Nya amat heran akan segala apa yang dikatakan tentang Dia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Simeon blessed them, and said to Mary, his mother,

block.text: Lalu Simeon memberkati mereka dan berkata kepada Maria, ibu Anak itu:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, this child is set for the falling and the rising of many in Israel, and for a sign which is spoken against.

block.text: <<Sesungguhnya Anak ini ditentukan untuk menjatuhkan atau membangkitkan banyak orang di Israel dan untuk menjadi suatu tanda yang menimbulkan perbantahan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yes, a sword will pierce through your own soul, that the thoughts of many hearts may be revealed.”

block.text: Suatu pedang akan menembus jiwamu sendiri—,supaya menjadi nyata pikiran hati banyak orang.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: There was one Anna, a prophetess, the daughter of Phanuel, of the tribe of Asher (she was of a great age, having lived with a husband seven years from her virginity.

block.text: Lagipula di situ ada Hana, seorang nabi perempuan, anak Fanuel dari suku Asyer. Ia sudah sangat lanjut umurnya. Sesudah kawin ia hidup tujuh tahun lamanya bersama suaminya,

ReferenceBlocks.text: She had been a widow for about eighty-four years). She didn't depart from the temple, worshipping with fastings and petitions night and day.

block.text: dan sekarang ia janda dan berumur delapan puluh empat tahun. Ia tidak pernah meninggalkan Bait Allah dan siang malam beribadah dengan berpuasa dan berdoa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Coming up at that very hour, she gave thanks to the Lord, and spoke of him to all those who were looking for redemption in Jerusalem.

block.text: Dan pada ketika itu juga datanglah ia ke situ dan mengucap syukur kepada Allah dan berbicara tentang Anak itu kepada semua orang yang menantikan kelepasan untuk Yerusalem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they had accomplished all things that were according to the law of the Lord, they returned into Galilee, to their own city, Nazareth.

block.text: Dan setelah selesai semua yang harus dilakukan menurut hukum Tuhan, kembalilah mereka ke kota kediamannya, yaitu kota Nazaret di Galilea.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The child was growing, and was becoming strong in spirit, being filled with wisdom, and the grace of God was upon him.

block.text: Anak itu bertambah besar dan menjadi kuat, penuh hikmat, dan kasih karunia Allah ada pada-Nya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: His parents went every year to Jerusalem at the feast of the Passover.

block.text: Tiap-tiap tahun orang tua Yesus pergi ke Yerusalem pada hari raya Paskah.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he was twelve years old, they went up to Jerusalem according to the custom of the feast.

block.text: Ketika Yesus telah berumur dua belas tahun pergilah mereka ke Yerusalem seperti yang lazim pada hari raya itu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they had fulfilled the days, as they were returning, the boy Jesus stayed behind in Jerusalem. Joseph and his mother didn't know it.

block.text: Sehabis hari-hari perayaan itu, ketika mereka berjalan pulang, tinggallah Yesus di Yerusalem tanpa diketahui orang tua-Nya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: She supposed him to be in the company. They went a day's journey and then they looked for him among their relatives and acquaintances.

block.text: Karena mereka menyangka bahwa Ia ada di antara orang-orang seperjalanan mereka, berjalanlah mereka sehari perjalanan jauhnya, lalu mencari Dia di antara kaum keluarga dan kenalan mereka.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they didn't find him, they returned to Jerusalem, looking for him.

block.text: Karena mereka tidak menemukan Dia, kembalilah mereka ke Yerusalem sambil terus mencari Dia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened after three days they found him in the temple, sitting in the midst of the teachers, both listening to them, and asking them questions.

block.text: Sesudah tiga hari mereka menemukan Dia dalam Bait Allah; Ia sedang duduk di tengah-tengah alim ulama, sambil mendengarkan mereka dan mengajukan pertanyaan-pertanyaan kepada mereka.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All who heard him were amazed at his understanding and his answers.

block.text: Dan semua orang yang mendengar Dia sangat heran akan kecerdasan-Nya dan segala jawab yang diberikan-Nya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they saw him, they were astonished, and his mother said to him,

block.text: Dan ketika orang tua-Nya melihat Dia, tercenganglah mereka, lalu kata ibu-Nya kepada-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Son, why have you treated us this way? Behold, your father and I were anxiously looking for you.”

block.text: <<Nak, mengapakah Engkau berbuat demikian terhadap kami? Bapa-Mu dan aku dengan cemas mencari Engkau.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Jawab-Nya kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why were you looking for me? Didn't you know that I must be in my Father's house?”

block.text: <<Mengapa kamu mencari Aku? Tidakkah kamu tahu, bahwa Aku harus berada di dalam rumah Bapa-Ku?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: They didn't understand the saying which he spoke to them.

block.text: Tetapi mereka tidak mengerti apa yang dikatakan-Nya kepada mereka.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And he went down with them, and came to Nazareth. He was subject to them, and his mother kept all these sayings in her heart.

block.text: Lalu Ia pulang bersama-sama mereka ke Nazaret; dan Ia tetap hidup dalam asuhan mereka. Dan ibu-Nya menyimpan semua perkara itu di dalam hatinya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature, and in favor with God and men.

block.text: Dan Yesus makin bertambah besar dan bertambah hikmat-Nya dan besar-Nya, dan makin dikasihi oleh Allah dan manusia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: LUKE CHP 3

Now it was the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar, Pontius Pilate being governor of Judea, and Herod being tetrarch of Galilee, and his brother Philip tetrarch of the region of Ituraea and Trachonitis, and Lysanias tetrarch of Abilene.

block.text: Dalam tahun kelima belas dari pemerintahan Kaisar Tiberius, ketika Pontius Pilatus menjadi wali negeri Yudea, dan Herodes raja wilayah Galilea, Filipus, saudaranya, raja wilayah Iturea dan Trakhonitis, dan Lisanias raja wilayah Abilene,

ReferenceBlocks.text: In the high priesthood of Annas and Caiaphas, the word of God came to John, the son of Zacharias, in the wilderness.

block.text: pada waktu Hanas dan Kayafas menjadi Imam Besar, datanglah firman Allah kepada Yohanes, anak Zakharia, di padang gurun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He came into all the region around the Jordan, preaching and saying:

block.text: Maka datanglah Yohanes ke seluruh daerah Yordan dan menyerukan:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Receive this baptism of repentence for the forgiveness of sins.”

block.text: <<Bertobatlah dan berilah dirimu dibaptis dan Allah akan mengampuni dosamu,>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: As it is written in the book of the words of Isaiah the prophet,

block.text: seperti ada tertulis dalam kitab nubuat-nubuat Yesaya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The voice of one crying in the wilderness, ‘Make ready the way of the Lord. Make his paths straight.

block.text: <<Ada suara yang berseru-seru di padang gurun: <Persiapkanlah jalan untuk Tuhan, luruskanlah jalan bagi-Nya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Every valley will be filled. Every mountain and hill will be brought low. The crooked will become straight, and the rough ways smooth.
All flesh will see God's salvation.’”

block.text: Setiap lembah akan ditimbun dan setiap gunung dan bukit akan menjadi rata, yang berliku-liku akan diluruskan, yang berlekuk-lekuk akan diratakan,
dan semua orang akan melihat keselamatan yang dari Tuhan.> >>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said therefore to the multitudes who went out to be baptized by him,

block.text: Lalu ia berkata kepada orang banyak yang datang kepadanya untuk dibaptis, katanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You offspring of vipers, who warned you to flee from the wrath to come?

block.text: <<Hai kamu keturunan ular beludak! Siapakah yang mengatakan kepada kamu melarikan diri dari murka yang akan datang?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Bring forth therefore fruits worthy of repentance, and don't begin to say among yourselves, ‘We have Abraham for our father;’ for I tell you that God is able to raise up children to Abraham from these stones!

block.text: Jadi hasilkanlah buah-buah yang sesuai dengan pertobatan. Dan janganlah berpikir dalam hatimu: Abraham adalah bapa kami! Karena aku berkata kepadamu: Allah dapat menjadikan anak-anak bagi Abraham dari batu-batu ini!

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even now the axe also lies at the root of the trees. Every tree therefore that doesn't bring forth good fruit is cut down, and thrown into the fire.”

block.text: Kapak sudah tersedia pada akar pohon dan setiap pohon yang tidak menghasilkan buah yang baik, akan ditebang dan dibuang ke dalam api.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: The multitudes asked him,

block.text: Orang banyak bertanya kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What then must we do?”

block.text: <<Jika demikian, apakah yang harus kami perbuat?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He answered them,

block.text: Jawabnya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He who has two coats, let him give to him who has none. He who has food, let him do likewise.”

block.text: <<Barangsiapa mempunyai dua helai baju, hendaklah ia membaginya dengan yang tidak punya, dan barangsiapa mempunyai makanan, hendaklah ia berbuat juga demikian.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Tax collectors also came to be baptized, and they said to him,

block.text: Ada datang juga pemungut-pemungut cukai untuk dibaptis dan mereka bertanya kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Teacher, what must we do?”

block.text: <<Guru, apakah yang harus kami perbuat?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Jawabnya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Collect no more than that which is appointed to you.”

block.text: <<Jangan menagih lebih banyak dari pada yang telah ditentukan bagimu.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Soldiers also asked him, saying,

block.text: Dan prajurit-prajurit bertanya juga kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What about us? What must we do?”

block.text: <<Dan kami, apakah yang harus kami perbuat?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Jawab Yohanes kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Extort from no one by violence, neither accuse anyone wrongfully. Be content with your wages.”

block.text: <<Jangan merampas dan jangan memeras dan cukupkanlah dirimu dengan gajimu.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: As the people were in expectation, and all men reasoned in their hearts concerning John,

block.text: Tetapi karena orang banyak sedang menanti dan berharap, dan semuanya bertanya dalam hatinya tentang Yohanes,

ReferenceBlocks.text: Could John be the Messiah?

block.text: kalau-kalau ia adalah Mesias,

ReferenceBlocks.text: John answered them all,

block.text: Yohanes menjawab dan berkata kepada semua orang itu:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I indeed baptize you with water, but he comes who is mightier than I, the latchet of whose sandals I am not worthy to loosen. He will baptize you in the Holy Spirit and fire.

block.text: <<Aku membaptis kamu dengan air, tetapi Ia yang lebih berkuasa dari padaku akan datang dan membuka tali kasut-Nyapun aku tidak layak. Ia akan membaptis kamu dengan Roh Kudus dan dengan api.

ReferenceBlocks.text: His winnowing fork is in his hand, and he will thoroughly cleanse his threshing floor, and will gather the wheat into his barn; but he will burn up the chaff with unquenchable fire.”

block.text: Alat penampi sudah di tangan-Nya untuk membersihkan tempat pengirikan-Nya dan untuk mengumpulkan gandum-Nya ke dalam lumbung-Nya, tetapi debu jerami itu akan dibakar-Nya dalam api yang tidak terpadamkan.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then with many other exhortations he preached good news to the people.

block.text: Dengan banyak nasihat lain Yohanes memberitakan Injil kepada orang banyak.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He reproved Herod, saying to him:

block.text: Dia menegur Herodes, berkata kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It is unlawful for you to have your brother's wife!”

block.text: "Tidak halal engkau mengambil isteri saudaramu!"

ReferenceBlocks.text: And he reproved him for all the other evil things which Herod had done.

block.text: Dan dia ditegur dia untuk semua hal jahat lain yang Herodes telah dilakukan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then Herod did something even worse: He put John in prison.

block.text: Kemudian Herodes melakukan sesuatu yang bahkan lebih buruk lagi: Dia meletakkan Yohanes di penjara.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now it happened, when all the people were baptized, Jesus also had been baptized, and was praying.

block.text: Sekarang hal itu terjadi, ketika semua orang dibaptis, Yesus juga dibaptis dan sedang berdoa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The sky was opened,
and the Holy Spirit descended in a bodily form as a dove on him; and a voice came out of the sky, saying

block.text: Langit itu dibuka,
dan Roh Kudus turun dalam bentuk tubuh seperti burung merpati kepadanya, dan terdengarlah suara dari langit, mengatakan

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You are my beloved Son. In you I am well pleased.”

block.text: <<Engkaulah Anak-Ku yang Kukasihi, kepada-Mulah Aku berkenan.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus himself, when he began to teach, was about thirty years old, being the son (as was supposed) of Joseph, the son of Heli,

block.text: Ketika Yesus memulai pekerjaan-Nya, Ia berumur kira-kira tiga puluh tahun dan menurut anggapan orang, Ia adalah anak Yusuf, anak Eli,

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Matthat, the son of Levi, the son of Melchi, the son of Jannai, the son of Joseph,

block.text: anak Matat, anak Lewi, anak Malkhi, anak Yanai, anak Yusuf,

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Mattathias, the son of Amos, the son of Nahum, the son of Esli, the son of Naggai,

block.text: anak Matica, anak Amos, anak Nahum, anak Hesli, anak Nagai,

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Maath, the son of Mattathias, the son of Semein, the son of Joseph, the son of Judah,

block.text: anak Maat, anak Matica, anak Simei, anak Yosekh, anak Yoda,

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Joanan, the son of Rhesa, the son of Zerubbabel, the son of Shealtiel, the son of Neri,

block.text: anak Yohanan, anak Resa, anak Zerubabel, anak Sealtiel, anak Neri,

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Melchi, the son of Addi, the son of Cosam, the son of Elmodam, the son of Er,

block.text: anak Malkhi, anak Adi, anak Kosam, anak Elmadam, anak Er,

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Jose, the son of Eliezer, the son of Jorim, the son of Matthat, the son of Levi,

block.text: anak Yesua, anak Eliezer, anak Yorim, anak Matat, anak Lewi,

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Simeon, the son of Judah, the son of Joseph, the son of Jonan, the son of Eliakim,

block.text: anak Simeon, anak Yehuda, anak Yusuf, anak Yonam, anak Elyakim,

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Melea, the son of Menan, the son of Mattatha, the son of Nathan, the son of David,

block.text: anak Melea, anak Mina, anak Matata, anak Natan, anak Daud,

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Jesse, the son of Obed, the son of Boaz, the son of Salmon, the son of Nahshon,

block.text: anak Isai, anak Obed, anak Boas, anak Salmon, anak Nahason,

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Amminadab, the son of Aram, the son of Hezron, the son of Perez, the son of Judah,

block.text: anak Aminadab, anak Admin, anak Arni, anak Hezron, anak Peres, anak Yehuda,

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Jacob, the son of Isaac, the son of Abraham, the son of Terah, the son of Nahor,

block.text: anak Yakub, anak Ishak, anak Abraham, anak Terah, anak Nahor,

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Serug, the son of Reu, the son of Peleg, the son of Eber, the son of Shelah,

block.text: anak Serug, anak Rehu, anak Peleg, anak Eber, anak Salmon,

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Cainan, the son of Arphaxad, the son of Shem, the son of Noah, the son of Lamech,

block.text: anak Kenan, anak Arpakhsad, anak Sem, anak Nuh, anak Lamekh,

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Methuselah, the son of Enoch, the son of Jared, the son of Mahalaleel, the son of Cainan,

block.text: anak Metusalah, anak Henokh, anak Yared, anak Mahalaleel, anak Kenan,

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Enos, the son of Seth, the son of Adam, the son of God.

block.text: anak Enos, anak Set, anak Adam, anak Allah.

ReferenceBlocks.text: LUKE CHP 4
Jesus, full of the Holy Spirit, returned from the Jordan, and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness.

block.text: Yesus, yang penuh dengan Roh Kudus, kembali dari sungai Yordan, lalu dibawa oleh Roh Kudus ke padang gurun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For forty days he was being tempted by the devil. He ate nothing in those days. Afterward, when they were completed, he was hungry.
The devil said to him,

block.text: Di situ Ia tinggal empat puluh hari lamanya dan dicobai Iblis. Selama di situ Ia tidak makan apa-apa dan sesudah waktu itu Ia lapar.
Lalu berkatalah Iblis kepada-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If you are the Son of God, command this stone to become bread.”

block.text: <<Jika Engkau Anak Allah, suruhlah batu ini menjadi roti.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered him, saying,

block.text: Jawab Yesus kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It is written, ‘Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word of God.’”

block.text: <<Ada tertulis: <Manusia hidup bukan dari roti saja.> >>

ReferenceBlocks.text: The devil, leading him up on a high mountain, showed him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time.
The devil said to him,

block.text: Kemudian ia membawa Yesus ke suatu tempat yang tinggi dan dalam sekejap mata ia memperlihatkan kepada-Nya semua kerajaan dunia.
Kata Iblis kepada-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I will give you all this authority, and their glory, for it has been delivered to me; and I give it to whomever I want.

block.text: <<Segala kuasa itu serta kemuliaannya akan kuberikan kepada-Mu, sebab semuanya itu telah diserahkan kepadaku dan aku memberikannya kepada siapa saja yang kukehendaki.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If you therefore will worship before me, it will all be yours.”

block.text: Jadi jikalau Engkau menyembah aku, seluruhnya itu akan menjadi milik-Mu.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered him,

block.text: Tetapi Yesus berkata kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Get behind me Satan! For it is written, ‘You shall worship the Lord your God, and you shall serve him only.’”

block.text: <<Ada tertulis: <Engkau harus menyembah Tuhan, Allahmu, dan hanya kepada Dia sajalah engkau berbakti!> >>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He led him to Jerusalem, and set him on the pinnacle of the temple, and said to him,

block.text: Kemudian ia membawa Yesus ke Yerusalem dan menempatkan Dia di bubungan Bait Allah, lalu berkata kepada-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If you are the Son of God, cast yourself down from here.

block.text: <<Jika Engkau Anak Allah, jatuhkanlah diri-Mu dari sini ke bawah,

ReferenceBlocks.text: For it is written, ‘He will put his angels in charge of you, to guard you;’

block.text: sebab ada tertulis: <Mengenai Engkau, Ia akan memerintahkan malaikat-malaikat-Nya untuk melindungi Engkau,

ReferenceBlocks.text: and, ‘On their hands they will bear you up, lest perhaps you dash your foot against a stone.’”

block.text: dan mereka akan menatang Engkau di atas tangannya, supaya kaki-Mu jangan terantuk kepada batu.> >>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answering, said to him,

block.text: Yesus menjawabnya, kata-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It has been said, ‘You shall not tempt the Lord your God.’”

block.text: <<Ada firman: <Jangan engkau mencobai Tuhan, Allahmu!> >>

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the devil had completed every temptation, he departed from him until another time.

block.text: Sesudah Iblis mengakhiri semua pencobaan itu, ia mundur dari pada-Nya dan menunggu waktu yang baik.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee, and news about him spread through all the surrounding area.

block.text: Dalam kuasa Roh kembalilah Yesus ke Galilea. Dan tersiarlah kabar tentang Dia di seluruh daerah itu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He taught in their synagogues, being glorified by all.

block.text: Sementara itu Ia mengajar di rumah-rumah ibadat di situ dan semua orang memuji Dia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He came to Nazareth, where he had been brought up. He entered, as was his custom, into the synagogue on the Sabbath day, and stood up to read.

block.text: Ia datang ke Nazaret tempat Ia dibesarkan, dan menurut kebiasaan-Nya pada hari Sabat Ia masuk ke rumah ibadat, lalu berdiri hendak membaca dari Alkitab.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The book of the prophet Isaiah was handed to him. He opened the book, and found the place where it was written,

block.text: Kepada-Nya diberikan kitab nabi Yesaya dan setelah dibuka-Nya, Ia menemukan nas, di mana ada tertulis:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The Spirit of the Lord is on me, because he has anointed me to preach good news to the poor.

block.text: <<Roh Tuhan ada pada-Ku, oleh sebab Ia telah mengurapi Aku, untuk menyampaikan kabar baik kepada orang-orang miskin;

ReferenceBlocks.text: He has sent me to heal the brokenhearted, to proclaim release to the captives, recovering of sight to the blind, to deliver those who are crushed,
and to proclaim the acceptable year of the Lord.”

block.text: dan Ia telah mengutus Aku untuk memberitakan pembebasan kepada orang-orang tawanan, dan penglihatan bagi orang-orang buta, untuk membebaskan orang-orang yang tertindas,
untuk memberitakan tahun rahmat Tuhan telah datang.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He closed the book, gave it back to the attendant, and sat down. The eyes of all in the synagogue were fastened on him.
He began to tell them,

block.text: Kemudian Ia menutup kitab itu, memberikannya kembali kepada pejabat, lalu duduk; dan mata semua orang dalam rumah ibadat itu tertuju kepada-Nya.
Lalu Ia memulai mengajar mereka, kata-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Today, this Scripture has been fulfilled in your hearing.”

block.text: <<Pada hari ini genaplah nas ini sewaktu kamu mendengarnya.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: All testified about him, and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth, and they said,

block.text: Dan semua orang itu membenarkan Dia dan mereka heran akan kata-kata yang indah yang diucapkan-Nya, lalu kata mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Isn't this Joseph's son?”

block.text: <<Bukankah Ia ini anak Yusuf?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Maka berkatalah Ia kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Doubtless you will tell me this parable, ‘Physician, heal yourself! Whatever we have heard done at Capernaum, do also here in your hometown.’”

block.text: <<Tentu kamu akan mengatakan pepatah ini kepada-Ku: Hai tabib, sembuhkanlah diri-Mu sendiri. Perbuatlah di sini juga, di tempat asal-Mu ini, segala yang kami dengar yang telah terjadi di Kapernaum!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said,

block.text: Dan kata-Nya lagi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Most certainly I tell you, no prophet is acceptable in his hometown.

block.text: <<Aku berkata kepadamu, sesungguhnya tidak ada nabi yang dihargai di tempat asalnya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But truly I tell you, there were many widows in Israel in the days of Elijah, when the sky was shut up three years and six months, when a great famine came over all the land.

block.text: Dan Aku berkata kepadamu, dan kata-Ku ini benar: Pada zaman Elia terdapat banyak perempuan janda di Israel ketika langit tertutup selama tiga tahun dan enam bulan dan ketika bahaya kelaparan yang hebat menimpa seluruh negeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Elijah was sent to none of them, except to Zarephath, in the land of Sidon, to a woman who was a widow.

block.text: Tetapi Elia diutus bukan kepada salah seorang dari mereka, melainkan kepada seorang perempuan janda di Sarfat, di tanah Sidon.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There were many lepers in Israel in the time of Elisha the prophet, yet not one of them was cleansed, except Naaman, the Syrian.”

block.text: Dan pada zaman nabi Elisa banyak orang kusta di Israel dan tidak ada seorangpun dari mereka yang ditahirkan, selain dari pada Naaman, orang Siria itu.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were all filled with wrath in the synagogue, as they heard these things.

block.text: Mendengar itu sangat marahlah semua orang yang di rumah ibadat itu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They rose up, threw him out of the city, and led him to the brow of the hill that their city was built on, that they might throw him off the cliff.

block.text: Mereka bangun, lalu menghalau Yesus ke luar kota dan membawa Dia ke tebing gunung, tempat kota itu terletak, untuk melemparkan Dia dari tebing itu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he, passing through their midst, went his way.

block.text: Tetapi Ia berjalan lewat dari tengah-tengah mereka, lalu pergi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He came down to Capernaum, a city of Galilee. He was teaching them on the Sabbath day.

block.text: Kemudian Yesus pergi ke Kapernaum, sebuah kota di Galilea, lalu mengajar di situ pada hari-hari Sabat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were astonished at his teaching, for his word was with authority.

block.text: Mereka takjub mendengar pengajaran-Nya, sebab perkataan-Nya penuh kuasa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In the synagogue there was a man who had a spirit of an unclean demon, and he cried out with a loud voice, saying,

block.text: Di dalam rumah ibadat itu ada seorang yang kerasukan setan dan ia berteriak dengan suara keras:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What have we to do with you, Jesus of Nazareth? Have you come to destroy us? I know you who you are: the Holy One of God!”

block.text: <<Hai Engkau, Yesus orang Nazaret, apa urusan-Mu dengan kami? Engkau datang hendak membinasakan kami? Aku tahu siapa Engkau: Yang Kudus dari Allah.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus rebuked him, saying,

block.text: Tetapi Yesus menghardiknya, kata-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Be silent, and come out of him!”

block.text: <<Diam, keluarlah dari padanya!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the demon had thrown him down in their midst, he came out of him, having done him no harm.

block.text: Dan setan itupun menghempaskan orang itu ke tengah-tengah orang banyak, lalu keluar dari padanya dan sama sekali tidak menyakitinya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Amazement came on all, and they spoke together, one with another, saying,

block.text: Dan semua orang takjub, lalu berkata seorang kepada yang lain, katanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What is this word? For with authority and power he commands the unclean spirits, and they come out!”

block.text: <<Alangkah hebatnya perkataan ini! Sebab dengan penuh wibawa dan kuasa Ia memberi perintah kepada roh-roh jahat dan merekapun keluar.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: News about him went out into every place of the surrounding region.

block.text: Dan tersebarlah berita tentang Dia ke mana-mana di daerah itu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He rose up from the synagogue, and entered into Simon's house. Simon's mother-in-law was afflicted with a great fever, and they begged him for her.

block.text: Kemudian Ia meninggalkan rumah ibadat itu dan pergi ke rumah Simon. Adapun ibu mertua Simon demam keras dan mereka meminta kepada Yesus supaya menolong dia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He stood over her, and rebuked the fever; and it left her. Immediately she rose up and served them.

block.text: Maka Ia berdiri di sisi perempuan itu, lalu menghardik demam itu, dan penyakit itupun meninggalkan dia. Perempuan itu segera bangun dan melayani mereka.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the sun was setting, all those who had any sick with various diseases brought them to him; and he laid his hands on every one of them, and healed them.

block.text: Ketika matahari terbenam, semua orang membawa kepada-Nya orang-orang sakitnya, yang menderita bermacam-macam penyakit. Iapun meletakkan tangan-Nya atas mereka masing-masing dan menyembuhkan mereka.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Demons also came out from many, crying out, and saying,

block.text: Dari banyak orang keluar juga setan-setan sambil berteriak:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You are the Christ, the Son of God!”

block.text: <<Engkau adalah Anak Allah.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Rebuking them, he didn't allow them to speak, because they knew that he was the Christ.

block.text: Lalu Ia dengan keras melarang mereka dan tidak memperbolehkan mereka berbicara, karena mereka tahu bahwa Ia adalah Mesias.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When it was day, he departed and went into an uninhabited place. The multitudes looked for him and found him. They held on to him so that he wouldn't go away from them.
But he said to them,

block.text: Ketika hari siang, Yesus berangkat dan pergi ke suatu tempat yang sunyi. Tetapi orang banyak mencari Dia, lalu menemukan-Nya dan berusaha menahan Dia supaya jangan meninggalkan mereka.
Tetapi Ia berkata kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I must preach the good news of the Kingdom of God to the other cities also. For this reason I have been sent.”

block.text: <<Juga di kota-kota lain Aku harus memberitakan Injil Kerajaan Allah sebab untuk itulah Aku diutus.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He was preaching in the synagogues of Galilee.

block.text: Dan Ia memberitakan Injil dalam rumah-rumah ibadat di Yudea.

ReferenceBlocks.text: LUKE CHP 5
Now it happened, while the multitude pressed on him and heard the word of God, that he was standing by the lake of Gennesaret.

block.text: Pada suatu kali Yesus berdiri di pantai danau Genesaret, sedang orang banyak mengerumuni Dia hendak mendengarkan firman Allah.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He saw two boats standing by the lake, but the fishermen had gone out of them, and were washing their nets.

block.text: Ia melihat dua perahu di tepi pantai. Nelayan-nelayannya telah turun dan sedang membasuh jalanya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He entered into one of the boats, which was Simon's, and asked him to put out a little from the land. He sat down and taught the multitudes from the boat.

block.text: Ia naik ke dalam salah satu perahu itu, yaitu perahu Simon, dan menyuruh dia supaya menolakkan perahunya sedikit jauh dari pantai. Lalu Ia duduk dan mengajar orang banyak dari atas perahu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he had finished speaking, he said to Simon,

block.text: Setelah selesai berbicara, Ia berkata kepada Simon:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Put out into the deep, and let down your nets for a catch.”

block.text: <<Bertolaklah ke tempat yang dalam dan tebarkanlah jalamu untuk menangkap ikan.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Simon answered him,

block.text: Simon menjawab:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Master, we worked all night, and took nothing; but at your word I will let down the net.”

block.text: <<Guru, telah sepanjang malam kami bekerja keras dan kami tidak menangkap apa-apa, tetapi karena Engkau menyuruhnya, aku akan menebarkan jala juga.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they had done this, they caught a great multitude of fish, and their net was breaking.

block.text: Dan setelah mereka melakukannya, mereka menangkap sejumlah besar ikan, sehingga jala mereka mulai koyak.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They beckoned to their partners in the other boat, that they should come and help them. They came, and filled both boats, so that they began to sink.

block.text: Lalu mereka memberi isyarat kepada teman-temannya di perahu yang lain supaya mereka datang membantunya. Dan mereka itu datang, lalu mereka bersama-sama mengisi kedua perahu itu dengan ikan hingga hampir tenggelam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Simon Peter, when he saw it, fell down at Jesus’ knees, saying,

block.text: Ketika Simon Petrus melihat hal itu iapun tersungkur di depan Yesus dan berkata:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Depart from me, for I am a sinful man, Lord.”

block.text: <<Tuhan, pergilah dari padaku, karena aku ini seorang berdosa.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he was amazed, and all who were with him, at the catch of fish which they had caught.

block.text: Sebab ia dan semua orang yang bersama-sama dengan dia takjub oleh karena banyaknya ikan yang mereka tangkap;

ReferenceBlocks.text: James and John, sons of Zebedee, who were partners with Simon were also amazed. Jesus said to Simon,

block.text: demikian juga Yakobus dan Yohanes, anak-anak Zebedeus, yang menjadi teman Simon. Kata Yesus kepada Simon:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don't be afraid. From now on you will be fishers of men!”

block.text: <<Jangan takut, mulai dari sekarang engkau akan menjala manusia.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they had brought their boats to land, they left everything, and followed him.

block.text: Dan sesudah mereka menghela perahu-perahunya ke darat, merekapun meninggalkan segala sesuatu, lalu mengikut Yesus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened, while he was in one of the cities, behold, there was a man full of leprosy. When he saw Jesus, he fell on his face, and begged him, saying,

block.text: Pada suatu kali Yesus berada dalam sebuah kota. Di situ ada seorang yang penuh kusta. Ketika ia melihat Yesus, tersungkurlah ia dan memohon:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, if you want to, you can make me clean.”

block.text: <<Tuan, jika Tuan mau, Tuan dapat mentahirkan aku.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He stretched out his hand, and touched him, saying,

block.text: Lalu Yesus mengulurkan tangan-Nya, menjamah orang itu, dan berkata:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I want to... Be made clean.”

block.text: <<Aku mau, jadilah engkau tahir.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Immediately the leprosy left him.
He commanded him to tell no one,

block.text: Seketika itu juga lenyaplah penyakit kustanya.
Yesus melarang orang itu memberitahukannya kepada siapapun juga dan berkata:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “But go your way, and show yourself to the priest, and offer for your cleansing according to what Moses commanded, for a testimony to them.”

block.text: <<Pergilah, perlihatkanlah dirimu kepada imam dan persembahkanlah untuk pentahiranmu persembahan seperti yang diperintahkan Musa, sebagai bukti bagi mereka.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the report concerning him spread much more, and great multitudes came together to hear, and to be healed by him of their infirmities.

block.text: Tetapi kabar tentang Yesus makin jauh tersiar dan datanglah orang banyak berbondong-bondong kepada-Nya untuk mendengar Dia dan untuk disembuhkan dari penyakit mereka.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He withdrew himself into the desert, and prayed.

block.text: Akan tetapi Ia mengundurkan diri ke tempat-tempat yang sunyi dan berdoa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened on one of those days, that he was teaching; and there were Pharisees and teachers of the law sitting by, who had come out of every village of Galilee, Judea, and Jerusalem. The power of the Lord was with him to heal them.

block.text: Pada suatu hari ketika Yesus mengajar, ada beberapa orang Farisi dan ahli Taurat duduk mendengarkan-Nya. Mereka datang dari semua desa di Galilea dan Yudea dan dari Yerusalem. Kuasa Tuhan menyertai Dia, sehingga Ia dapat menyembuhkan orang sakit.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, men brought a paralyzed man on a cot, and they sought to bring him in to lay before Jesus.

block.text: Lalu datanglah beberapa orang mengusung seorang lumpuh di atas tempat tidur; mereka berusaha membawa dia masuk dan meletakkannya di hadapan Yesus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Not finding a way to bring him in because of the multitude, they went up to the housetop, and let him down through the tiles with his cot into the midst before Jesus.

block.text: Karena mereka tidak dapat membawanya masuk berhubung dengan banyaknya orang di situ, naiklah mereka ke atap rumah, lalu membongkar atap itu, dan menurunkan orang itu dengan tempat tidurnya ke tengah-tengah orang banyak tepat di depan Yesus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Seeing their faith, he said to him,

block.text: Ketika Yesus melihat iman mereka, berkatalah Ia:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Man, your sins are forgiven you.”

block.text: <<Hai saudara, dosamu sudah diampuni.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: The scribes and the Pharisees began to reason, saying,

block.text: Tetapi ahli-ahli Taurat dan orang-orang Farisi berpikir dalam hatinya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Who is this that speaks blasphemies? Who can forgive sins, but God alone?”

block.text: <<Siapakah orang yang menghujat Allah ini? Siapa yang dapat mengampuni dosa selain dari pada Allah sendiri?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Jesus, perceiving their thoughts, answered them,

block.text: Akan tetapi Yesus mengetahui pikiran mereka, lalu berkata kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why are you reasoning so in your hearts?

block.text: <<Apakah yang kamu pikirkan dalam hatimu?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Which is easier to say, ‘Your sins are forgiven you;’ or to say, ‘Arise and walk?’

block.text: Manakah lebih mudah, mengatakan: <Dosamu sudah diampuni,> atau mengatakan: <Bangunlah, dan berjalanlah?>

ReferenceBlocks.text: But that you may know that the Son of Man has authority on earth to forgive sins”

block.text: Tetapi supaya kamu tahu, bahwa di dunia ini Anak Manusia berkuasa mengampuni dosa>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: (he said to the paralyzed man),

block.text: —berkatalah Ia kepada orang lumpuh itu—:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I tell you, arise, and take up your cot, and go to your house.”

block.text: <<Kepadamu Kukatakan, bangunlah, angkatlah tempat tidurmu dan pulanglah ke rumahmu!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Immediately he rose up before them, and took up that which he was laying on, and departed to his house, glorifying God.

block.text: Dan seketika itu juga bangunlah ia, di depan mereka, lalu mengangkat tempat tidurnya dan pulang ke rumahnya sambil memuliakan Allah.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Amazement took hold on all, and they glorified God. They were filled with fear, saying,

block.text: Semua orang itu takjub, lalu memuliakan Allah, dan mereka sangat takut, katanya:

block.characterId: everyone seeing healing of paralyzed man

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: everyone seeing healing of paralyzed man
ReferenceBlocks.text: “We have seen strange things today.”

block.text: <<Hari ini kami telah menyaksikan hal-hal yang sangat mengherankan.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: After these things he went out, and saw a tax collector named Levi sitting at the tax office, and said to him,

block.text: Kemudian, ketika Yesus pergi ke luar, Ia melihat seorang pemungut cukai, yang bernama Lewi, sedang duduk di rumah cukai. Yesus berkata kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Follow me!”

block.text: <<Ikutlah Aku!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He left everything, and rose up and followed him.

block.text: Maka berdirilah Lewi dan meninggalkan segala sesuatu, lalu mengikut Dia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Levi made a great feast for him in his house. There was a great crowd of tax collectors and others who were reclining with them.

block.text: Dan Lewi mengadakan suatu perjamuan besar untuk Dia di rumahnya dan sejumlah besar pemungut cukai dan orang-orang lain turut makan bersama-sama dengan Dia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Their scribes and the Pharisees murmured against his disciples, saying,

block.text: Orang-orang Farisi dan ahli-ahli Taurat bersungut-sungut kepada murid-murid Yesus, katanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why do you eat and drink with the tax collectors and sinners?”

block.text: <<Mengapa kamu makan dan minum bersama-sama dengan pemungut cukai dan orang berdosa?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered them,

block.text: Lalu jawab Yesus kepada mereka, kata-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Those who are healthy have no need for a physician, but those who are sick do.

block.text: <<Bukan orang sehat yang memerlukan tabib, tetapi orang sakit;

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have not come to call the righteous, but sinners to repentance.”

block.text: Aku datang bukan untuk memanggil orang benar, tetapi orang berdosa, supaya mereka bertobat.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said to him,

block.text: Orang-orang Farisi itu berkata pula kepada Yesus:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why do John's disciples often fast and pray, likewise also the disciples of the Pharisees, but yours eat and drink?”

block.text: <<Murid-murid Yohanes sering berpuasa dan sembahyang, demikian juga murid-murid orang Farisi, tetapi murid-murid-Mu makan dan minum.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Jawab Yesus kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Can you make the friends of the bridegroom fast, while the bridegroom is with them?

block.text: <<Dapatkah sahabat mempelai laki-laki disuruh berpuasa, sedang mempelai itu bersama mereka?

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the days will come when the bridegroom will be taken away from them. Then they will fast in those days.”

block.text: Tetapi akan datang waktunya, apabila mempelai itu diambil dari mereka, pada waktu itulah mereka akan berpuasa.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He also told a parable to them.

block.text: Ia mengatakan juga suatu perumpamaan kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “No one puts a piece from a new garment on an old garment, or else he will tear the new, and also the piece from the new will not match the old.

block.text: <<Tidak seorangpun mengoyakkan secarik kain dari baju yang baru untuk menambalkannya pada baju yang tua. Jika demikian, yang baru itu juga akan koyak dan pada yang tua itu tidak akan cocok kain penambal yang dikoyakkan dari yang baru itu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: No one puts new wine into old wineskins, or else the new wine will burst the skins, and it will be spilled, and the skins will be destroyed.

block.text: Demikian juga tidak seorangpun mengisikan anggur yang baru ke dalam kantong kulit yang tua, karena jika demikian, anggur yang baru itu akan mengoyakkan kantong itu dan anggur itu akan terbuang dan kantong itupun hancur.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But new wine must be put into fresh wineskins, and both are preserved.

block.text: Tetapi anggur yang baru harus disimpan dalam kantong yang baru pula.

ReferenceBlocks.text: No man having drunk old wine immediately desires new, for he says, ‘The old is better.’”

block.text: Dan tidak seorangpun yang telah minum anggur tua ingin minum anggur yang baru, sebab ia akan berkata: <Anggur yang tua itu baik.> >>

ReferenceBlocks.text: LUKE CHP 6
Now it happened on the second Sabbath after the first, that he was going through the grain fields. His disciples plucked the heads of grain, and ate, rubbing them in their hands.

block.text: Pada suatu hari Sabat, ketika Yesus berjalan di ladang gandum, murid-murid-Nya memetik bulir gandum dan memakannya, sementara mereka menggisarnya dengan tangannya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But some of the Pharisees said to them,

block.text: Tetapi beberapa orang Farisi berkata:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why do you do that which is not lawful to do on the Sabbath day?”

block.text: <<Mengapa kamu berbuat sesuatu yang tidak diperbolehkan pada hari Sabat?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus, answering them, said,

block.text: Lalu Yesus menjawab mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Haven't you read what David did when he was hungry, he, and those who were with him;

block.text: <<Tidakkah kamu baca apa yang dilakukan oleh Daud, ketika ia dan mereka yang mengikutinya lapar,

ReferenceBlocks.text: how he entered into God's house, and took and ate the show bread, and gave also to those who were with him, which is not lawful to eat except for the priests alone?”

block.text: bagaimana ia masuk ke dalam Rumah Allah dan mengambil roti sajian, lalu memakannya dan memberikannya kepada pengikut-pengikutnya, padahal roti itu tidak boleh dimakan kecuali oleh imam-imam?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Kata Yesus lagi kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The Son of Man is lord of the Sabbath.”

block.text: <<Anak Manusia adalah Tuhan atas hari Sabat.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: It also happened on another Sabbath that he entered into the synagogue and taught. There was a man there, and his right hand was withered.

block.text: Pada suatu hari Sabat lain, Yesus masuk ke rumah ibadat, lalu mengajar. Di situ ada seorang yang mati tangan kanannya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The scribes and the Pharisees watched him, to see whether he would heal on the Sabbath, that they might find an accusation against him.

block.text: Ahli-ahli Taurat dan orang-orang Farisi mengamat-amati Yesus, kalau-kalau Ia menyembuhkan orang pada hari Sabat, supaya mereka dapat alasan untuk mempersalahkan Dia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he knew their thoughts; and he said to the man who had the withered hand,

block.text: Tetapi Ia mengetahui pikiran mereka, lalu berkata kepada orang yang mati tangannya itu:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Rise up, and stand in the middle.”

block.text: <<Bangunlah dan berdirilah di tengah!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He arose and stood.
Then Jesus said to them,

block.text: Maka bangunlah orang itu dan berdiri.
Lalu Yesus berkata kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I will ask you something: Is it lawful on the Sabbath to do good, or to do harm? To save a life, or to kill?”

block.text: <<Aku bertanya kepada kamu: Manakah yang diperbolehkan pada hari Sabat, berbuat baik atau berbuat jahat, menyelamatkan nyawa orang atau membinasakannya?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He looked around at them all, and said to the man,

block.text: Sesudah itu Ia memandang keliling kepada mereka semua, lalu berkata kepada orang sakit itu:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Stretch out your hand.”

block.text: <<Ulurkanlah tanganmu!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He did, and his hand was restored as sound as the other.

block.text: Orang itu berbuat demikian dan sembuhlah tangannya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But they were filled with rage, and talked with one another, saying:

block.text: Maka meluaplah amarah mereka, lalu mereka berunding, apakah yang akan

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What can we do about Jesus?”

block.text: mereka lakukan terhadap Yesus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened in these days, that he went out to the mountain to pray, and he continued all night in prayer to God.

block.text: Pada waktu itu pergilah Yesus ke bukit untuk berdoa dan semalam-malaman Ia berdoa kepada Allah.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When it was day, he called his disciples, and from them he chose twelve, whom he also named apostles:

block.text: Ketika hari siang, Ia memanggil murid-murid-Nya kepada-Nya, lalu memilih dari antara mereka dua belas orang, yang disebut-Nya rasul:

ReferenceBlocks.text: Simon, whom he also named Peter; Andrew, his brother; James; John; Philip; Bartholomew;

block.text: Simon yang juga diberi-Nya nama Petrus, dan Andreas saudara Simon, Yakobus dan Yohanes, Filipus dan Bartolomeus,

ReferenceBlocks.text: Matthew; Thomas; James, the son of Alphaeus; Simon, who was called the Zealot;

block.text: Matius dan Tomas, Yakobus anak Alfeus, dan Simon yang disebut orang Zelot,

ReferenceBlocks.text: Judas the son of James; and Judas Iscariot, who also became a traitor.

block.text: Yudas anak Yakobus, dan Yudas Iskariot yang kemudian menjadi pengkhianat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He came down with them, and stood on a level place, with a crowd of his disciples. A great number of the people from all Judea and Jerusalem and the sea coast of Tyre and Sidon came to hear him and to be healed of their diseases.

block.text: Lalu Ia turun dengan mereka dan berhenti pada suatu tempat yang datar. Di situ berkumpul sejumlah besar dari murid-murid-Nya dan banyak orang lain yang datang dari seluruh Yudea dan dari Yerusalem dan dari daerah pantai Tirus dan Sidon.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Those who were troubled by unclean spirits came and were healed.

block.text: Mereka datang untuk mendengarkan Dia dan untuk disembuhkan dari penyakit mereka; juga mereka yang dirasuk oleh roh-roh jahat beroleh kesembuhan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All the multitude sought to touch him, for power came out from him and healed them all.

block.text: Dan semua orang banyak itu berusaha menjamah Dia, karena ada kuasa yang keluar dari pada-Nya dan semua orang itu disembuhkan-Nya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He lifted up his eyes to his disciples, and said,

block.text: Lalu Yesus memandang murid-murid-Nya dan berkata:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Blessed are you who are poor, for yours is the Kingdom of God.

block.text: <<Berbahagialah, hai kamu yang miskin, karena kamulah yang empunya Kerajaan Allah.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Blessed are you who hunger now, for you will be filled. Blessed are you who weep now, for you will laugh.

block.text: Berbahagialah, hai kamu yang sekarang ini lapar, karena kamu akan dipuaskan. Berbahagialah, hai kamu yang sekarang ini menangis, karena kamu akan tertawa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Blessed are you when men shall hate you, and when they shall exclude and mock you, and throw out your name as evil, for the Son of Man's sake.

block.text: Berbahagialah kamu, jika karena Anak Manusia orang membenci kamu, dan jika mereka mengucilkan kamu, dan mencela kamu serta menolak namamu sebagai sesuatu yang jahat.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Rejoice in that day, and leap for joy, for behold, your reward is great in heaven, for their fathers did the same thing to the prophets.”

block.text: <<Bersukacitalah pada waktu itu dan bergembiralah, sebab sesungguhnya, upahmu besar di sorga; karena secara demikian juga nenek moyang mereka telah memperlakukan para nabi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “But woe to you who are rich! For you have received your consolation.

block.text: Tetapi celakalah kamu, hai kamu yang kaya, karena dalam kekayaanmu kamu telah memperoleh penghiburanmu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Woe to you, you who are full now, for you will be hungry. Woe to you who laugh now, for you will mourn and weep.

block.text: Celakalah kamu, yang sekarang ini kenyang, karena kamu akan lapar. Celakalah kamu, yang sekarang ini tertawa, karena kamu akan berdukacita dan menangis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Woe, when men speak well of you, for their fathers did the same thing to the false prophets.”

block.text: Celakalah kamu, jika semua orang memuji kamu; karena secara demikian juga nenek moyang mereka telah memperlakukan nabi-nabi palsu.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: “But I tell you who hear: love your enemies, do good to those who hate you;

block.text: <<Tetapi kepada kamu, yang mendengarkan Aku, Aku berkata: Kasihilah musuhmu, berbuatlah baik kepada orang yang membenci kamu;

ReferenceBlocks.text: bless those who curse you, and pray for those who mistreat you.

block.text: mintalah berkat bagi orang yang mengutuk kamu; berdoalah bagi orang yang mencaci kamu.
